metadata.title: CVE-2021-22249 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A verbose error message in GitLab EE affecting all versions since 12.2could disclose the private email address of a user invited to a group

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
